summary: Why Thanos will be difficult to kill in Infinity War 2. Because there will always be a queue of people lining up to kill him.
title: Why Thanos will be difficult to kill in Infinity War 2. Because there will always be a queue of people lining up to kill him.
body:
Like, when you piss off and hurt  *that* many people.

Then make your escape while they keep bickering over who gets to end you.

reblog.comment:
Like, when you piss off and hurt  *that* many people.

Then make your escape while they keep bickering over who gets to end you.

trail.content_raw:
Like, when you piss off and hurt  *that* many people.

Then make your escape while they keep bickering over who gets to end you.
trail.content:
Like, when you piss off and hurt  *that* many people.

Then make your escape while they keep bickering over who gets to end you.

summary:
Tony: Guys I'm not gonna be mad just tell me why you have fake ids
Ned and Peter: *incoherent mumbling*
Tony: You're gonna have...
body:
Tony: Guys I'm not gonna be mad just tell me why you have fake ids
Ned and Peter: *incoherent mumbling*
Tony: You're gonna have to speak louder
Peter: You have to be over 18 to hold the puppies at petco
Tony: ...

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: Guys I'm not gonna be mad just tell me why you have fake ids

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: You're gonna have to speak louder

dialogue.name: Peter
dialogue.label: Peter:
dialogue.phrase: You have to be over 18 to hold the puppies at petco

tags: original: how i met your mother
summary:
[Steve’s annoyed by Bucky and Tony’s super-cute couple behavior]  

 Steve: What the hell has gotten into you two? When did you...
body:
[Steve’s annoyed by Bucky and Tony’s super-cute couple behavior]

Steve: What the hell has gotten into you two? When did you become so nauseating?

Bucky: Isn’t it great to finally see him fulfilled emotionally, spiritually and sexually?

Steve: Um, I dated him for a year.

Bucky: [tilts head and smirks] Yeah.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: The Ides of July
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QWCPKw

by justkeepdreaming

BOOK ONE. The world has changed. After aliens invaded New York City and superhumans continue to emerge from the woodwork, society has been forced to accept that which it does not know or understand.

Anna, a young freelance journalist, witnesses these changes first hand as she travels the world, always observing yet never participating in events which continually shape the future.

Now, after watching an Avenger murder a seemingly innocent man before her very eyes, she’s thrust into action. Narrowly escaping death with Loki, the God of Mischief, Anna finds herself at a crossroads.

How do you fight that which you do not understand?

Words: 221, Chapters: 1/53, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Metamorphosis Series

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel, Thor (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Original Female Character(s), Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Bruce Banner, Jane Foster (Marvel), Original Male Character(s)
  • Relationships: Loki (Marvel)/Original Female Character(s), Loki (Marvel) & Original Female Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: Marvel Universe, Post-Avengers (2012), Canon Compliant, Avengers Tower, Cross-Posted on Wattpad


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QWCPKw

blog.description:
She/Her---Panromantic bisexual---ask me anything! Currently obsessed with Vlog Squad, Dark, Sanders sides, The Umbrella Academy, Criminal Minds and Marvel. 

Find my writing on Archive Of Our Own.
http://archiveofourown.org/users/Drhair76/works

summary: New Friends - Drhair76 - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
body:
New Friends - Drhair76 - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]

Tony was a billionaire, the co owner of one of the biggest companies in the world and a superhero in his own right. Or, ‘genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist’ if you wanted it in his own words. Even though Bucky was sure that one of those titles was inactive at the moment, he knew that Tony’s feats were quite impressive and he wasn’t one to be underestimated.

So why would he need someone to look after him?

Or,

Bucky is new and needs to get hip to the fact that in the private eye, Tony is just a puppy who needs a hug.
